attributes.action: introduce legislation to stop the use of taxpayer pounds to bail out companies and individuals who have put their money at risk overseas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IceSave depositors did so with their eyes open and they did it because they are greedy.  Now that it has gone boobs up they want me and the rest of the taxpayers in the UK to bail them out.  this is fraud, this is theft, this is misappropriation of taxpayer contributions.  this has to be stopped.
